verbs.description: [ARG0: No speaker at the Democratic convention] [V: made] [ARG1: a more powerful case against Trump than the First Lady] -- and Michelle Obama did it without saying his name .
No speaker at the Democratic convention made a more powerful case against Trump than the First Lady -- and [ARG0: Michelle Obama] [V: did] [ARG1: it] [ARGM-MNR: without saying his name] .
No speaker at the Democratic convention made a more powerful case against Trump than the First Lady -- and Michelle Obama did it without [V: saying] [ARG1: his name] .
